text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The annual beachside summer<n>training camp is well
underway, where<n>the students are training harder than<n>
usual.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The sand provides such a different<n>experience from running
on turf. I can<n>truly feel the impact it's having on<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: All right, I should give it another—

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, did you hear there's gonna be a<n>festival held around
here tonight?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: There is? Let's go after training, then!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh, a festival? That sounds rather<n>charming.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I have some fond memories of going<n>to one when I was
younger. It was fun<n>to see all the stalls and activities on<n>
offer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ah, would that be all right?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
In that case, I'd best wrap up my<n>training quickly. I'll put
everything into<n>this last sprint.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After our training ends, McQueen and<n>I head to the festival
grounds as a<n>golden hue befalls the skies.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh, it's all so lively!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
There are so many stalls that I almost<n>don't know where to
start... Ah!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Um, would it be okay to take a look at<n>some of the stalls
farther that way?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you! Let's be off, then.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I intend to follow right behind her, but<n>as I begin walking...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The crowds prove tricky to navigate,<n>and I bump into
someone.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
By the time that I am able to get my<n>bearings again, I have
already lost<n>sight of McQueen.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even after searching for a while, I am<n>unable to locate her in
the sea of<n>people.
choice_data_list: (Just how far could she have gone?)
(Just how far could she have gone?)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Just then, the announcement system<n>comes online.

text_block_list.name: Staff
text_block_list.text:
A lost person has come to the staff<n>tent. Mejiro McQueen is
seeking her<n>trainer. Please come to the event staff<n>tent
upon hearing this message.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh, there you are!
choice_data_list: I'm glad you're all right too.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry, it's all because I went on<n>ahead without so much
as looking<n>back.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
This time I'll be sure to stick by your<n>side as we walk
around...
choice_data_list: It wasn't a big deal, really.
It wasn't a big deal, really.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Even so, I don't want to cause you<n>any more trouble...
choice_data_list:
There's one rule at a festival: let loose and have
fun!

There's one rule at a festival: let loose and have
fun!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Huh? That's... a rule?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, it would appear that everyone<n>is following the edict
well.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
In that case, I have a request. Can we<n>head back towards
the stalls I had<n>originally taken an interest in?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'd like you to join me in the<n>festivities.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Just have to fish this little one out...<n>Ha!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh no, the string snapped... Shopkeep,<n>I'd like to try again!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro McQueen has taken a keen<n>interest in the balloon
fishing game.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: A short time later...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I did it, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I look over to see McQueen<n>triumphantly holding a festival
balloon.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, that ended up being more of an<n>ordeal than I thought.
I'm glad I could<n>scoop it up in the end.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I feel like I could conquer any of the<n>games here. Let's
head to the next<n>stall!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Oh, look over there! A shooting game!<n>It says they have
premium prizes as<n>well!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I wonder what we can get... Shall we<n>take a look?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Trainer, come with me!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After taking in all of the excitement<n>that the festival has to
offer, we<n>decide to walk back to the training<n>camp
grounds together.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Thank you so much for<n>accompanying me tonight. It was
very<n>enjoyable.
choice_data_list: I didn't do much but stand around, though.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: That's not true! Well, how do I put<n>this?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
If anyone else had come along, I<n>certainly wouldn't have
"let loose," as<n>you mentioned.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
As a Mejiro, I've always strived to<n>maintain a certain level
of decorum at<n>all times. However...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: If I'm with you, I... I feel like I can<n>afford to relax a bit.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: You don't mind that, do you?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
That makes me so happy to hear! I<n>have another request,
then.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Would you care to take a bit of a stroll<n>with me? We can eat
these carrot<n>sponge cakes I purchased along the<n>way.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Normally, I would consider eating<n>while walking to be poor
manners, but<n>it's just you and me out here<n>tonight...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, thank you! All right then, please<n>go ahead and help
yourself.
